Title: The I Inside
Overview: Simon Cable wakes up in a hospital bed, confused and disoriented. He soon discovers from doctors that he has amnesia and is unable to remember the last two years of his life. Cable investigates what has happened to him and slowly pieces together his enigmatic past.
Tagline: His story began when it all ended
production_companies: Miramax Films, Dimension Films, MDP Worldwide, RCD Productions Ltd.
Cast: Ryan Phillippe, Sarah Polley, Piper Perabo
clean_text: inside simon cable wake hospital bed confuse disorient soon discover doctor amnesia unable remember two year life cable investigate happen slowly piece enigmatic past story begin end thriller mystery science fiction drama roland suso richter ryan phillippe sarah polley piper perabo 2004
